source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_00<tab>Mauci is keen to study your technique.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_00<tab>ドタール・カーのマウシは、修行に付き合ってほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_01<tab>Mauci has decided the best way to improve his own abilities is to study how you fight. He gathers some fatty meat from the village in the hopes of attracting a few Nhaama analas for you to slay. It does not take long for the creatures to approach and you promptly ready yourself for combat.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_01<tab>マウシと話した。マウシの前で魔物を倒すことで、ドタール族以外の人間の戦い方を参考にしたいようだ。ナーマ砂漠北端で「マウシ」と話し、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2171201 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_02<tab>You make short work of the Nhaama analas, clearly impressing Mauci.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2171201 /var>を討伐した。ナーマ砂漠北端の「マウシ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_03<tab>The young Dotharl learned plenty from watching you fight. He mentions that the village is hosting a practice tourney and that he will attempt to make use of what he has seen in it. You make your way back to Dotharl Khaa to monitor the boy's progress.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_03<tab>マウシと話した。冒険者の戦いぶりは参考になったらしい。マウシはドタール・カーに戻り、行なわれている訓練試合に参加するようだ。ドタール・カーの「マウシ」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_04<tab>Sadly Mauci is defeated rather easily by his opponent. He hopes this will go some way to convincing the villagers that he is not and never will be skilled with a blade, but everyone remains steadfast in their belief that he is of the Seven and Seven Swords. Another young Dotharl named Khulan decides she has had enough of the crowd's comments, admonishing them on Mauci's behalf. Khulan introduces herself as an old friend of Mauci's, asking if you would be willing to help her improve Mauci's current situation.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_SEQ_04<tab>マウシと話した。マウシは、試合に大敗したが、周囲の人々はマウシが「七剣」であると信じきっている。マウシの幼馴染であるクーランは、マウシを周囲のプレッシャーから解放したいようだ。マウシの未来のため、クーランと協力しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mauci and slay the Nhaama analas.
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_000<tab>You will help me after all? Fantastic! Would you mind telling me your name?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_000旅人さん、修行に付き合ってくれるのかい？
恩に着るよ、ありがとう！
それで……ええっと、名前を教えてくれるかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you say? A fine name indeed. I would like to observe you fighting, so that I may learn what it is I am doing wrong.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_001それじゃ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
さっそくだけど、実際に戦ってみてくれないか？
君の戦う姿を見て、戦闘のコツを学びたいんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_002<tab>I shall find some Nhaama analas and study how you do battle with them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_002今の俺に足りないものに、気づけるかもしれないからね。
戦う相手は、砂漠にいる火の精にしてもらおうかな。
おびき寄せておくから、外で落ち合おう！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_010<tab>I took some of the fatty meat we usually feed to cattle and spread it around this area. The Nhaama analas will be here shortly─they cannot resist anything that burns as easily as fat. Here they are!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_010突き当りに、食べ残しの家畜の脂身をばら撒いておいたよ。
よく燃える脂は、火の精である、
「」の好物でね……。

TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_100_010俺はここで、見学させてもらうよ。
さあ、さっそくのお出ましのようだ、倒してくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_020<tab>Your style differs from what I am used to. But it is by no means unnatural. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you have given me much to think about.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_020なるほど、なるほど……。
流儀は違えど、間合いの取り方や、敵との呼吸の合わせ方、
いろいろと参考になったよ、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_021<tab>I shall try and make use of what you have shown me in our practice tourney. It will be starting shortly. It has been quite a while since I took part!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_021よし、学んだことは、さっそく実践しないとな！
そろそろ、ドタール・カーで訓練試合の時間だから、
久しぶりに参加してくるよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_030<tab>Ugh, well, as you no doubt saw that did not go to plan. Surely no one will believe I am a legendary swordsman now.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_MAUCI_000_030いたたた……)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
ごめん、ご覧のとおり、あっさりと負けちまったよ……。
これじゃあ誰も、俺が「七剣」だなんて思ってくれないよな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_DOTHARLAUDIENCEA02792_000_031<tab>(-Spectator-)I do not understand. How could Mauci of the Seven and Seven Swords be bested so easily?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_DOTHARLAUDIENCEA02792_000_031<tab>(-ドタール族の女-)まさか、「七剣」マウシが、こうもあっさり負けるとはね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_DOTHARLAUDIENCEB02792_000_032<tab>(-Spectator-)Wait, no, I see now! He merely pretended to lose to lure his opponent into a false sense of security.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_DOTHARLAUDIENCEB02792_000_032(-ドタール族の男-)……そ、そうか！
「七剣」マウシは、あまりに強すぎるから、
あえて負けて、相手に自信をつけさせてやったんだな！？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_DOTHARLAUDIENCEC02792_000_033<tab>(-Dotharli Warrior-)Do not hold back. You insult me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_DOTHARLAUDIENCEC02792_000_033(-ドタール族の戦士-)うーむ、格下相手に優しくしたいのはわかるが、
今度は手加減せず、戦ってくれよ！
そうじゃないと、訓練の意味がないからな！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_KHULAN_000_034<tab>What do any of you know about Mauci!? He is weak. Simply forcing him to fight will change nothing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_KHULAN_000_034あんたら、マウシのこと全然わかってない！
こいつは本当に弱いんだよ！
それなのに、みんな圧力ばっかりかけて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_KHULAN_000_035<tab>Are you an acquaintance of Mauci's? I am Khulan. I have been friends with Mauci ever since we were little─I know him better than most.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_KHULAN_000_035……あんたは、こいつの知り合い？
私の名はクーラン、マウシとは幼馴染でね。
真の実力は、よく知ってるつもりさ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_KHULAN_000_036<tab>You have doubtless heard all about how weak he is. However, I want to change his life for the better. Would you be willing to help me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ614_02792_KHULAN_000_036あんたも、マウシが本当は弱いってこと、聞いてるんだろ？
それならさ、私の手伝いをしてくれないか。
こいつの将来、どうにか良くしてやりたいんだよ……。
